snippet: The restaurant chain said its profits jumped 47.6 percent in the first quarter as it continued its explosive growth.
abstract: Chipotle reports first-quarter profit of $122.6 million, up 47.6 percent from year-earlier period; breaks billion dollar mark for first time, reporting sales of some $1.09 billion; restaurant operator Yum Brands reports quarterly profit of $362 million, down 9 percent from one year earlier; Brinker International reports profit of $65.4 million, up 16.4 percent from one year earlier; mixed results indicate changing preferences of American consumers.
lead_paragraph: The restaurant chain said its profits jumped 47.6 percent in the first quarter as it continued its explosive growth.

headline.main: Chipotle Posts Another Quarter of Billion-Dollar Sales
headline.print_headline: Chipotle Breaks Billion-Dollar Barrier in Sales for First Time in Single Quarter
